猶更: (なおさら) - all the more; still less
猶疑問が存: (なおぎもんがそん) - A doubt still remains
猿: (pt/saru) - monkey , monkey (esp. the Japanese macaque, Macaca fuscata), ape, non-human primate; sly person; idiot, hick; sliding wooden bolt (for holding a door or window shut)
猿ぐつわをかます: (さるぐつわをかます) - to gag someone
猿の尻笑い: (さるのしりわらい) - the pot calling the kettle black; people who live in glass houses shouldn't throw stones
猿の腰掛け: (サルノコシカケ) - polypore (bracket fungus, esp. of family Polyporaceae)
猿まね: (さるまね) - indiscriminate imitation; monkey see, monkey do; blind follower
猿も木から落ちる: (さるもきからおちる) - even monkeys fall from trees; anyone can make a mistake; pride comes before a fall; even Homer sometimes nods
猿公: (えてこう) - monkey/ape; personification of a monkey (e.g. Mr. Monkey)
猿回し: (さるまわし) - showman who trains performing monkeys
猿子: (マシコ) - rosefinch (any finch of genus Carpodacus); monkey
猿害: (さるがい) - damages inflicted by monkeys (on crops, etc.)
猿尾: (さるお) - backside part of the shamisen's neck where it meets the body
猿山: (さるやま) - hill in a monkey enclosure (at a zoo, etc.)
猿拳: (さるけん) - Monkey Fist; Monkey-Style kung-fu
猿捕茨: (サルトリイバラ) - Smilax china (species of sarsaparilla)
猿梨: (サルナシ) - hardy kiwi (Actinidia arguta); kiwi berry; tara vine; bower vine
猿渡: (さるわたり) - monkey bars; horizontal ladder
猿渡り: (さるわたり) - monkey bars; horizontal ladder
猿猴: (えんこう) - monkey (esp. a gibbon); hand of the puppeteer (puppet theatre); menstrual period; kappa
猿田彦: (さるだびこ) - Sarutahiko (Shinto god); Sarudahiko; Sarutabiko; Sarudabiko
猿真似: (さるまね) - indiscriminate imitation; monkey see, monkey do; blind follower
猿知恵: (さるじえ) - shallow cunning; shallow cleverness
猿神: (さるがみ) - monkey god; ape god
猿腦: (えんのう) - monkey brain (eaten as a delicacy, medicine, etc.)
猿臂を伸ばす: (えんぴをのばす) - to stretch one's arms; to elongate one's arms
猿袴: (さるばかま) - work hakama that are loose at the top and tight at the bottom
猿豆: (サルマメ) - Smilax biflora var. trinervula (variety of a species of greenbrier)
猿轡をかます: (さるぐつわをかます) - to gag someone
猿酒: (ましらざけ) - monkey booze; sake-like liquid produced by the fermentation of fruits left by monkeys in tree caches or hollows in rocks
猿面: (さるめん) - ape mask; ape-like face/ape face
猿面冠者: (さるめんかじゃ) - young person with a monkey-like face (nickname for Toyotomi Hideyoshi)
猿頬: (さるぼお) - cheek pouch (monkey, squirrel, etc.); iron mask that covers the chin and cheeks (worn by samurai); Anadara kagoshimensis (species of ark clam)
猿頬貝: (サルボオガイ) - Anadara kagoshimensis (species of ark clam)
猿頰: (さるぼお) - cheek pouch (monkey, squirrel, etc.); iron mask that covers the chin and cheeks (worn by samurai); Anadara kagoshimensis (species of ark clam)
猿頰貝: (サルボオガイ) - Anadara kagoshimensis (species of ark clam)
猿麻桛: (サルオガセ) - old man's beard (any lichen of genus Usnea)
獄中: (ごくちゅう) - during imprisonment; while in jail (gaol)
獄中日記: (ごくちゅうにっき) - prison diary
獄中記: (ごくちゅうき) - diary written in prison
獄卒: (ごくそつ) - low-ranking prison guard; hell's tormenting devils
獄死: (ごくし) - death in jail; death in gaol
獄道: (ごくどう) - wicked/evil/profligate/immoral; wickedness/evildoing; organized crime/yakuza/underworld
獅子: (しし) - lion; left-hand guardian dog at a Shinto shrine
獅子の座: (ししのざ) - Buddha's seat; seat of a high monk
獅子唐辛子: (ししとうがらし) - small sweet green pepper
獅子奮迅: (ししふんじん) - (yoji) being irresistible; being furiously vigorous; being intensely forceful
獅子奮迅の勢い: (ししふんじんのいきおい) - irresistible force
獅子宮: (ししきゅう) - Leo (5th zodiacal sign); the Lion
獅子座: (ししざ) - {astron} Leo (constellation)/the Lion; Buddha's seat/seat of a high monk
獅子座流星群: (ししざりゅうせいぐん) - Leonids
獅子舞: (ししまい) - lion dance; traditional dance performed by one or more dancers wearing a guardian lion costume
獅子舞い: (ししまい) - lion dance; traditional dance performed by one or more dancers wearing a guardian lion costume
獅子身中: (しししんちゅう) - (yoji) treacherous friend; snake in one's bosom; treacherous insider
獅子身中の虫: (しししんちゅうのむし) - treacherous friend
獅子鼻猿: (シシバナザル) - snub-nosed monkey (Rhinopithecus spp.)
獣の数字: (けもののすうじ) - Number of the Beast (i.e. 666)
獣人: (けものびと) - (fictional) fusion of human and animal; therianthrope; furry; human beast
獣偏: (けものへん) - kanji "dog" or "animal" radical at left
